metadata.title: CVE-2017-15101 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A missing patch for a stack-based buffer overflow in findTable() was foundin Red Hat version of liblouis before 2.5.4. An attacker could cause adenial of service condition or potentially even arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15101` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1').
